main.name: Nick Romans
main.description: who is passionate about innovation and creating eye catching applications
main.bio: I enjoy designing and building apps to make seemingly difficult tasks easy.  I have done most of my builds with React and Rails frameworks while also writing vanilla JS, Ruby, SQL, HTML and CSS.  I've always been a tech hobbiest with designing, animating and film making so I completed the Full Stack Web Development program at Flatiron school to bring my passion to life.

resume.skillmessage: I stay up to date with all of the latest developer trends while continuing to build my current library.

education.description: 525 hour course dedicated to building a strong programming foundation using Ruby, JavaScript, SQL, Rails and React

education.degree: BS Food Service Management AS Culinary Arts

work.title: Manager
work.description: Managed the #1 restaurant in Wake Forest including daily operations, food preparation, and staff

projects.title: Our Favorite Restaurants
projects.category: List your favorite restaurants and dishes.  Made with a Javascript front end and Rails API

projects.title: Farmers Market App
projects.category: Keep track of farmer markets as a farmer with many markets - Made with React front end and Rails API

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
